title: Client Disconnection after EVERY game.
body: I've had it with this bullshit client. I play LoL on my Windows laptop and it's fine. But EVERY single damn time I play on my Macbook the client loses connection after EVER damn game. Is there a fix for this???

replies.body: I don't think it's a network issue. As posted, I have no issues on PC.

Your Mac might be having a network issue that's causing you to lose connection from the game.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your OS.  Hope that helps!
Upvoting for this to be seen; I'm having the same problem (except I'm on a Mac) so someone plz answer this.
